title: in my last 6 ranked games.
body:
i have had at least one teammate go 1/2/3 kills and double digit deaths. in all 6 of my last ranked games that person or persons amounted to nothing all game and contributed very little to the team. one bad player is allowed to drag down the entire team and there isnt shit we can do about it other than to tell them to please stay out of ranked. 

why is this game like this?
